Package gamemanager

Class Scoreboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamemanager.Scoreboard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DominationMode
    public class Scoreboard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Scoreboard for Normal mode. It checks if the Final Frenzy is starting and add every kills to the Scoreboard with the player who committed the frag and how many tokens he got from it.
